name: Persona 5 Mobile (Alpha)
description:
This is a beta also the option of go to RL is unavailable for now!

My objective is to recreate as much as I can of Persona 5 gameplay into a mobile like game.

This will soon be available to android, I have noticed the process of exporting godot games to a apk because I tried and I got in my phone a message saying could not download if there is anyone who knows what to do comment here please
